fareFamilies-title_there: Fare selection for an outbound flight
fareFamilies-title_back: Fare selection for a return flight
fareFamilies-noFamiliesTitle: No available fates for selection for this flight
results-noResultsTitle: We have not found any suitable flights :(
results-noResultsSubTitle: Try to run search again or change the search form parameters.
results-flight-profitable-tooltip_1: We have found cheap round trip fare on this route.
results-flight-profitable-tooltip_2: You will get one ticket for the whole trip, for the best price.
filters-noResultsTitle: We have not found any suitable flights :(
filters-noResultsSubTitle: Try to tune up the filters.
filters-airlines-snackbar: Airline «%airline%» has been added to filters
filters-airlines-snackbar-remove: Airline «%airline%» has been removed from filters
filters-airports-snackbar: Airport «%airport%» has been added to filters
filters-airports-snackbar-remove: Airport «%airport%» has been removed from filters
filters-comfortable-tooltip: Flights by the same airline company and with departure from the same airport
filters-search-placeholder: Search by airline company name, flight number or airports names

filters-time-departure-snackbar-remove: Departure time «%interval%» has been removed from filters
filters-time-arrival-snackbar: Arrival time «%interval%» has been added to filters
filters-time-arrival-snackbar-remove: Arrival time «%interval%» has been removed from filters
error-actualization-Price:
During the seats availability check we have found out, that the price of the chosen flights has changed.
You can still buy those flights for the new price or choose the other ones.
error-actualization-Availability:
Unfortunately, there are no available seats left on the chosen flights.
Please, choose another flight.
error-actualization-Unknown:
We can't book this flights due to internal service error.
Please, try again later or choose another flight.
